summary: Kosmas, a young man living in the slums, constantly tries to make ends meet, hoping for a better day. Because of debts, he gets tangled up in smuggling. His morals are tested and he tries to find a way out.
cast: Giorgos Foundas|Margarita Papageorgiou|Stephanos Stratigos|Thanasis Vengos|Eva Brika|Haris Grigoriou|Andreas Douzos|Eftyhia Pavlogianni|Tassos Katrapas|Fanis Kabanis|Natasa Kalpidou|Manos Katrakis|Mimis Fotopoulos|Sieglinde Mayer|Mirella|Efi Linda|Zoi Magou|Greek Radio Symphony Orchestra|Nikos Koundouros|Nikos Tsachiridis|Anestis Vlahos
title: Magiki polis
